version_description: -Bug fixes

-Blank Page fixes for iPhones 4s, 5 and 5c
-A few tweaks for small screens
-Minor bug fixes

* New Languages Supported: Marathi, Punjabi & Assamese
* Send money using Phone contacts (To BHIM/*99# users)
* Blocking/Unblocking feature to protect users from unknown collect requests
* Easy access to saved beneficiaries
* Scan QR saved in phone gallery to send money
* Download your transaction history to keep track of your payments via BHIM
* SBI Maestro are now accepted
* One time option to edit non-mobile VPA

* Now split your bills and collect money from friends using Split Bill in Collect section
* Visit www.bhimupi.org.in for all information on BHIM
* Scan QR Code with ease without logging into the app
* Filter transaction history of upto 90 days on the basis of UPI IDs
* New Languages Supported: Urdu
* Voice over enabled app for accessibility for visually challenged
* Delete bank account option added
* Bill Payment reminders

Multi Agent Model: Merchants on BHIM can add agents to collect payments via QR on their behalf.
Agents will get payment confirmation on successful transactions on their mobile phones.
Refer a friend: Share BHIM app download link with your friends to help make India a cashless society.
Security Enhancements

A Small update for your seamless payment experience
- Enhanced QR scanning
- Improved Performance
- New banks added

Enhanced App performance

Bill Payments on BHIM.
Pay bills on the go using BHIM Bill Pay. Also you can save your bills for future payments.
Biller Categories: Post-paid Mobile, Landline, Broadband, DTH, Electricity, Gas & water.

Feature & performance enhancements
New functionality on BHIM*
Link your overdraft account for doing transaction using UPI , Mandate with one time execution & block functionality , viewinvoices before making a payment, receive funds from abroad using your BHIM UPI id and enhanced security for payments via QR & Intent.
*All the above functionalities are bank/merchant dependent , Please check with your bank to know more about it.

Feature & performance enhancements
New functionality on BHIM*
Link your overdraft account for doing transaction using UPI , Mandate with one time execution & block functionality , send gift with greeting message , view invoices before making a payment, receive funds from abroad using your BHIM UPI id and enhanced security for payments via QR & Intent.
* All the above functionalities are bank/merchant dependent, Please check with your bank to know more about it.
Enhancements and Updates
Enhanced App performance

Presenting BHIM in a new avatar with design changes, enhanced features and much more.

Let’s work towards making our country cashless, wishing you a pleasant journey on BHIM.
